IATASubtypeCode.description: Information about the IATA subtype classification for the IATA Aircraft Subtype. Use SSIM Appendix A.

IATATypeCode.description: Transportation type using IATA format. e.g. 743 for a Boeing 747-300. Use SSIM Appendix A.

ICAOTypeCode.description: Transportation type using ICAO format. e.g. B743 for a Boeing 747-300.
